calendar.description: House Natural Resources, Agriculture, and Environment Hearing

hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>merges several funds into the Utah Wildfire Fund (fund);<hr><ltbullet>modifies references to the funds merged into the fund;<hr><ltbullet>amends definition provisions;<hr><ltbullet>addresses delegation of fire management authority;<hr><ltbullet>addresses elements of the fund such as what is deposited into the fund and how money in the fund is used;<hr><ltbullet>requires reporting;<hr><ltbullet>authorizes rulemaking; <hr><ltbullet>moves provisions related to community wildfire preparedness plans addressing wildland-urban interface; <hr><ltbullet>includes a coordination clause with H.B. 48 to address the transition to the Utah Wildfire Fund; and<hr><ltbullet>makes technical and conforming amendments.
